``xarray`` accessors
====================

NDAccessor
----------

This accessor provides direct access to
much of the functionality of the whole ``nd``
package from ``xarray`` objects.

.. autoclass:: nd._xarray.NDAccessor
    :members:
    :show-inheritance:


FilterAccessor
-------------

This separate accessor provides direct access to
the filters implemented in ``nd.filters``.

.. autoclass:: nd._xarray.FilterAccessor
    :members:
    :show-inheritance:
